dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description: Simple yet flexible natural sorting in Python.
dependencies.name: py-natsort

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
PyPDF2 is a free and open source pure-python PDF library capable of
splitting, merging, cropping, and transforming the pages of PDF files.
It can also add custom data, viewing options, and passwords to PDF
files. PyPDF2 can retrieve text and metadata from PDFs as well.
dependencies.name: py-pypdf2

dependencies.description:
Pyvolve is an open-source Python module for simulating sequences along a
phylogenetic tree according to continuous-time Markov models of sequence
evolution
dependencies.name: py-pyvolve

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Statistical computations and models for use with SciPy
dependencies.name: py-statsmodels

dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.
dependencies.name: py-sympy

dependencies.description:
WebLogo is a web based application designed to make the generation of
sequence logos as easy and painless as possible.
dependencies.name: py-weblogo

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
phydms enables phylogenetic analyses using deep mutational scanning data
to inform the substitution models. It implements Experimentally informed
codon models (ExpCM) for phylogenetic inference and the detection of
biologically interesting selection.
name: py-phydms

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
